name: Car Crash III Real Damage
description:
Car Crash III Beam DH Real Damage Simulator - a real race with good graphics in the genre of an accident game machine on breaking where ever machines crash into each other. Play in the most cool races in the world, in excellent condition, in excellent condition.
Arrange your race on cars without rules! Races where cars are broken, constant high jump and high-speed races. Click on the gas and become part of the automotive world.
Racing without the Internet and wifa, racing on the steepest wheelbarrows, racing simulator, arcade for real racers, in which you can drive on the roads specially created for your pleasure car shooting games.
Arrange spectacular races against rivals, race cars for free without having to perform daily tasks, just destroy everything that is on your way, do not be afraid to chase the police, they are too afraid to damage their brand-new office cars.

Feature of the game:
- Realistic experience of extreme driving of steep cars;
- Visually stunning 3D graphics and realistic physics;
- Lots of fun from collisions, accidents, coups on the roof.
- The game for fans to drive faster than everyone and crashes into everything in its path;
- Realistic destruction of the car, accident and damage;

Do not be such as everyone is chasing in their unique style, let everyone around you are afraid of you and try to dodge the chase. Throw all competitors in a row and then crash their cars for spare parts along the entire track!
